title: Improve constraint failure error messages
close_reason: Implemented improved constraint failure error messages that show variable bindings

title: Support reading test from stdin with cctr -
Add JSON types: json_string, json_bool, json_array, json_object
Replace with/having syntax with unified where clause
description: Change cctr syntax from separate with/having sections to a single where clause. Make types optional in variable definitions with inline syntax like {{ x }}, {{ x: number }}, {{ x:string }}, {{ x : json object }}. Implement duck-typing for variables without explicit types: json string > json array > json object > number > bool > string fallback.

title: Add negative test cases for JSON types
Add adversarial tests for JSON types
Replace in/not in with contains for arrays
cctr should run only tests in specified file, not entire directory
Add 'not in' operator as shorthand for 'not (x in y)'
close_reason: Added 'not in' operator as shorthand for 'not (x in y)'

title: Refactor json_types tests into separate files per type
Replace with/having with single where clause and inline types
description: Change cctr syntax from with/having to a single where clause. Types become optional inline in variable definitions: {{ x }}, {{ x: number }}, {{ x:string }}, {{ x : json object }}. Duck-type variables without explicit types based on JSON parsing rules.
